description: Anderson Ness, a failed horror author, hid his secrets in a New York attic. Harlan will enter a dimension in between truth and lie, nightmare and reality: a cursed place where imagination is held hostage by the terrifying creatures a Master of the Night created, who are able to make the ghosts generated by Ness’s pen come alive and killing. To uncover the mystery, Harlan must solve the riddles contained in the one book the disappeared writer published, “Hell’s Eyes”, to find the strange “rust house”...
name: La porta degli incubi

description: A puzzling dream, featuring two of his father’s friends, Edward Foster e Dolly Mac Laine, prompts Harlan on an intricate and difficult way, where the most dangerous and complex of his adventures will begin. It all started with the mysterious “Sun Swastika”, an artifact made by an ancient Eastern civilization, that once belonged to the Blue Wolves. Maybe, though, there are two of the Swastikas, which are to be joined to express their full power. The other one is only mentioned in an old diary, written in Polish by a Jewish boy who disappeared in World War II... It’s crucial to unveil his story, in a surprising interchange between past, present and unknown worlds, that will put Dampyr and his friends Kurjak, Tesla, Matthew Shady and Vera Bendix in great danger...
name: Notte e nebbia

description: In a special Third Reich college, the young Jew Ephraim (a.k.a. Ludwig) pretends to be a member of the Hitlerjugend, in order to fight the Nazi professors. Count Von Korngold assigns him a crucial mission: to defend the mysterious “sun swastika” while the Red Army and far more dangerous foes besiege the castle's walls... 60 years later, in Kongsberg's ruins, Harlan and his partners will face a deadly challenge posed by Martin De Vere and his Blue Wolves...
name: L’armata della morte

description: Sometimes in the fog you can hear strange, distorted sounds. The legend says there's a shtetl in there, an old Jewish village that the magic of great Rabbi Eleazar allowed to be spared from the Nazi fury... You can enter the town of Radzin just once a year, provided that you find the right path and manage to escape its cursed guards: the “100 Knights” led by the Cossack ataman Bogdan the Black! That's the town where, apparently, the fugitives boys took refuge, together with the swastika sought by Harlan and the Blue Wolves. Radzin will be the theatre of a bloody clash... But violence is banned in the enchanted village, and any offender is thrown in the space abyss!...
name: Il villaggio incantato

description: Harlan wakes up in a world in between reality and fantasy... The only thing he barely remembers is that he's been killed... Are the flying creatures of that crepuscular world real? And what about the unbelievable subterranean place that professor Foster and the attractive Sandy O’Sullivan roam, where dangerous monsters crouch in the darkness?... Does the terrifying technological city where Martin De Vere offers him an alliance against the vampires exist for real?... De Vere will help Harlan if the dampyr promises him to kill Draka, his own father, believed by Martin to be the usurper of the legendary throne of “King of the World”...
name: Il Re del Mondo
Through Time and Space the Illustrated Story of Communications
